title: Antigravity vs Khan Academy AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Khan Academy AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Khan Academy AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Khan Academy AI
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Khan Academy AI (generative ai) is Khan Academy AI is a non-profit educational platform that leverages artificial intelligence to provide personalized, mastery-based learning experiences. Its key capabilities include adaptive exercises, real-time progress tracking, and an AI-powered tutoring assistant (Khanmigo) that offers step-by-step guidance and Socratic dialogue. It uniquely serves a global audience of students, teachers, and parents with a completely free core curriculum, distinguishing it from commercial adaptive learning platforms.. Users choose it for adaptive-learning, k-12-education, ai-tutoring.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

Khan Academy AI: AI-powered tutor (Khanmigo) for interactive, conversational guidance in math, science, and humanities, Adaptive practice exercises that adjust difficulty based on student performance, Mastery-based progress tracking with detailed skill dashboards

verdict: Both Antigravity and Khan Academy AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Khan Academy AI for adaptive-learning.
